name: Solar Escape (LD49)
description:
This is woefully incomplete.  It's not really a game.  Unity kept crashing ... The sun was too hot ... my dog ate my video card.

I decided to upload something.  Revel in the comic book style intro.  Bask in the glow of a pastel starfield.  Wander around an empty spaceship, looking at the microgames that could have been.

We will be working on this game further, and will likely publish it, once we have things in a playable state.
